original_text: People will come from east and west and north and south, and will take their places at the feast in the kingdom of God.
korean_text: 사람들이 동서남북으로부터 와서 하나님의 나라 잔치에 참여하리니

sentences.original_text: People will come from east and west
and will take their places at the feast
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 잔치 자리에 앉게 될 것입니다
